title: **Prices Reduced** FS 5 Different T206 HOFers and Rare Backs (also Yankees Tickets)
author: Blunder19

posts.post_title: **Prices Reduced** FS 5 Different T206 HOFers and Rare Backs (also Yankees Tickets)
posts.post_content:
**Prices Reduced**
I am selling a few more t206's.. Feel free to ask anyone from my last go around if they were happy with the cards they got. Heres what I am letting go:

T206 Mathewson Portrait (PR-FR) $200
T206 Lajoie Portrait (GD) $110
T206 Walsh Portrait (GD-VG) $80
T206 Lundgren (slight trim at the bottom, otherwise it would be VG-EX) No Creases. $80
T206 Ford Red Hindu SGC 10  $380

Also on a side note.. I have season Yanks tickets, field level box 134 6 rows from the field. If your interested in any POST SEASON tickets shoot me a message.

Email at [url]blunder19@aol.com[/url] if interested in any t206s or Yanks tickets.

Prices include shipping.. paypal gift ok..
